title: Check out the uniforms UCLA will wear vs. Cal tonight (PHOTO)
text:
Check out the uniforms UCLA will wear vs. Cal tonight (PHOTO) 
UCLA will wear all-black uniforms vs. Cal. Jake Roth-USA TODAY Sports Oct 22, 2015 at 5:57p ET 0Shares 
Earlier this week, Mora was peppered with questions about UCLA's all-black uniform look vs. Cal. He didn't want to talk about it . true UCLA's Jim Mora on if all-black uniforms help team: "Uh, no. I think playing well will... I couldn't care less about uniforms right now." â€” Stefanie Loh (@StefanieLoh) October 20, 2015 
With photos emerging on Twitter, however, the uniforms have certainly created some buzz. The Adidas jerseys, nicknamed "The City" uniforms, are all-black with gold lettering (and a blue outline) with on the UCLA logo. The shoulder has three stripes (much like the Adidas logo) with two gold sandwiching one blue. true
